summary: The video features a person expressing strong frustration and disgust towards the idea of putting pineapple on pizza. The speaker uses emphatic language and expletives to convey their intense dislike, stating that they 'curl their toe' at the thought of it. keywords: pineapple, pizza, muppet, curl my toe, frustration, disgust, expletives
